sequence_equality = fun net : seq_num_network => forall p p' : packet, In p (nwPackets net) -> In p' (nwPackets net) -> tmNum (pBody p) = tmNum (pBody p') -> pSrc p = pSrc p' -> p = p' : seq_num_network -> Prop
Record BaseParams : Type := Build_BaseParams { data : Type; input : Type; output : Type } Arguments Build_BaseParams (_ _ _)%type_scope
Inductive step_dup (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : step_relation network (name * (input + list output)) := StepDup_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> step_dup net net' [(pDst p, inr out)] | StepDup_input : forall (h : name) (net net' : network) (out : list output) (inp : input) (d : data) (l : list
Record MultiParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_MultiParams { name : Type; msg : Type; msg_eq_dec : forall x y : msg, {x = y} + {x <> y}; name_eq_dec : forall x y : name, {x = y} + {x <> y}; nodes : list name; all_names_nodes : forall n : name, In n nodes; no_dup_nodes : NoDup nodes; init_handlers : name -> data; net_handlers : name -> name -> msg -> data -> list output * data * list (name * msg); input_handlers : name -> input -> data -> list output * data * list (name * msg) } Arguments Build_MultiParams _ [name msg]%type_scope (_ _)%function_scope [nodes]%list_scope _%function_scope _ (_ _ _)%function_scope
step_async_init = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) => {| nwPackets := []; nwState := init_handlers |} : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), network Arguments step_async_init {P params}
true_in_reachable : forall A trace : Type, step_relation A trace -> A -> (A -> Prop) -> Prop
inductive_invariant_true_in_reachable : forall (A trace : Type) (step : step_relation A trace) (init : A) (P : A -> Prop), inductive_invariant step init P -> true_in_reachable step init P
step_dup_star = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) => refl_trans_1n_trace step_dup : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), step_relation network (name * (input + list output)) Arguments step_dup_star {P params}
true_in_reachable_reqs : forall (A trace : Type) (step : step_relation A trace) (init : A) (P : A -> Prop), P init -> (forall (a a' : A) (out : list trace), step a a' out -> reachable step init a -> P a -> P a') -> true_in_reachable step init P
true_in_reachable_elim : forall (A trace : Type) (step : step_relation A trace) (init : A) (P : A -> Prop), true_in_reachable step init P -> P init /\ (forall (a a' : A) (out : list trace), step a a' out -> reachable step init a -> P a -> P a')
StepDup_dup : forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net' = {| nwPackets := p :: xs ++ p :: ys; nwState := nwState net |} -> step_dup net net' []
StepDup_input : forall (h : name) (net net' : network) (out : list output) (inp : input) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), input_handlers h inp (nwState net h) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets h l ++ nwPackets net; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d |} -> step_dup net net' [(h, inl inp); (h, inr out)]
StepDup_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> step_dup net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]
StepOrderedDynamicFailure_fail : forall (h : name) (net net' : ordered_dynamic_network) (failed : list name), ~ In h failed -> In h (odnwNodes net) ->...-> step_ordered_dynamic_failure (failed, net) (h :: failed, net') [] where ?P : [orig_base_params : BaseParams orig_multi_params : MultiParams orig_base_params |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [orig_base_params : BaseParams orig_multi_params : MultiParams orig_base_params |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [orig_base_params : BaseParams orig_multi_params : MultiParams orig_base_params |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?new_msg_params : [orig_base_params : BaseParams orig_multi_params : MultiParams orig_base_params |- NewMsgParams ?multi_params] ?fail_msg_params : [orig_base_params : BaseParams orig_multi_params : MultiParams orig_base_params |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]
